mapper.select: select mem_name, apply_count, lec_link, lec_readcount, lec_title, lec_con, lec_date,mem_refile from (select mem_name, apply_count, lec_link, lec_readcount, lec_title, lec_con, lec_date,t.mem_refile from member m join lecture on (mem_no=tutor_no) join tutorList t using (mem_no) where tutor_no = #{tutor_no} order by lec_date desc) where rownum=1
